attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: I got this app to keep in touch with our wonderful hot cheeto president and I regret to say that this app does not live up to the expectations, and honestly the bare minimums. I mean, you would think with the way he is running this country, at least the app would be good right? Sadly it is not. This app took nearly 2 hours to download and my wifi has been working perfectly fine. Not only that, but the app continued to repeatedly glitch and there were certain moments when it would just shut down. I am quite disappointed, but then again no one should expect anything of high quality from our lovely orange president, Donald Trump.

attributes.title: Yikes
attributes.review: I was prompted through a Facebook ad to download this app. This app is buggy & froze my phone up. I was hoping to find a reason to vote red this election, but this broken, decroded, non-functional joke of an app was the last straw. Iâ€™m pretty sure it installed spyware on my phone because all my other apps started acting buggy as soon as I installed it - and this is a brand new phone that functioned PERFECTLY before. Half of my settings are displaying in Russian now and I canâ€™t fix it. Iâ€™m gonna have to wipe the whole drive, which means taking it to the Apple store and spending money I donâ€™t have. Wish I could rate 0 stars. This app doesnâ€™t belong in the App Store.

attributes.title: this app RUINED my life
attributes.review: I thought this app would be a good patriotic thing to interact with on the 4th of July. BOY WAS I WRONG. Not only does the app glitch every second, it also sends me inappropriate notifications at least once a minute that refuse to leave the screen. It even told me to become a vegetarian because I was eating bacon too much. No one gets to tell me to stop eating pigs. Then, the app hacked my bank account and stole all my money, and hacked my WiFi and turned my Alexa against me, making her insult my grandmother in her own home, before unlocking all my doors and letting pedophiles in to steal ALL of my things. Now, Iâ€™m homeless, I have no money left, and my grandmother hates me.

attributes.review:
Bee Movie Script - Dialogue Transcript

  
According to all known laws
of aviation,

  
there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

  
Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

  
The bee, of course, flies anyway

  
because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.

  
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

  
Ooh, black and yellow!
Let's shake it up a little.

  
Barry! Breakfast is ready!

  
Ooming!

  
Hang on a second.

  
Hello?

  
- Barry?
- Adam?

  
- Oan you believe this is happening?
- I can't. I'll pick you up.

  
Looking sharp.

  
Use the stairs. Your father
paid good money for those.

  
Sorry. I'm excited.

  
Here's the graduate.
We're very proud of you, son.

  
A perfect report card, all B's.

  
Very proud.

  
Ma! I got a thing going here.

  
- You got lint on your fuzz.
- Ow! That's me!

  
- Wave to us! We'll be in row 118,000.
- Bye!

  
Barry, I told you,
stop flying in the house!

  
- Hey, Adam.
- Hey, Barry.

  
- Is that fuzz gel?
- A little. Special day, graduation.

  
Never thought I'd make it.

attributes.title: Bronchitis and Dog AIDS!
attributes.review: This app is terrible! Not only did it take so long to download (even with good wifi), it also glitches on almost every page. It was a waste of time and effort. Also, Iâ€™m pretty sure the app gave me bronchitis. Thatâ€™s how bad it was. I just wanted to get easy updates about my president but now I canâ€™t breathe and I cough every time I go into the app! I thought it was just me so just to be sure, I showed my dog the app, and now my dog has AIDS! YES YOU READ CORRECTLY! THE APP GAVE MY DOG AIDS! Now I need to spend my limited money on my bronchitis and dog aids medication. As if 2020 couldnâ€™t get any worse. So disappointing! Please reconsider getting this app. If I could give a 0 star review I would!
